channel.title: Journey of creating a debut album with Axoloti
channel.description:
I'm recording an electronic music debut album. Most of the synth and drum sounds are produced with two Axolotis.
First single was just released on Spotify. Check out if you're interested:
A harmonious fusion of pulsating rhythms, tranquil cosmic ambience, and earthy electronic melodies
https://open.spotify.com/track/1l0VBJ7hRI3af0SemswrCi?si=V0VyGnUsQqGBcuI9kr0NXQ "Neural Punch," the first single from Circuit Horizon's upcoming debut album, fuses retro sounds from 80s and 90s electronic music with contemporary and futuristic elements, aiming to create a unique and genre-defying sonic landscape.
https://instagram.com/circuithorizon
More to come :slight_smile: Cheers!
